title: Cleanliness and convenience
text:
Located in Formosa boulevard mrt and in front of exit one which it at 6th floor. Value for money, safe and clean environment. Staffs are nice and helpful. It was satisfied for me as a solo traveller.
Walk around 10mins to Liuhe night market.

title: Plaka
text: Plaka is built on top of the residential areas of the ancient town of Athens. It is an area of restaurants, Jewelry stores tourist shops, and cafes. Though it is quite commercialized neighborhood and arguably the nicest in central Athens.

title: Acropolis (visited to Greece Oct 19)
text: It's spent 45 mins to queue when buying the ticket of Acropolis which was quite wasted time on this. If they can improve on the service and their tourism will be better.
